attributes.long-description:
The exciting Syphon Filter®: Logan's Shadow is now available as a full download for your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system.

Desperate. Alone. Betrayed. Gabe Logan stands alone. They've disbanded his team. His partner is missing and accused of treason. How far will he go to find the truth? Syphon Filter®: Logan's Shadow keeps you on the edge of your seat with an engaging storyline by best-selling author Greg Rucka.

• All-New Submerged Missions: Experience underwater exploration and combat.
• Strike with Precision: Target enemy body parts with 55+ high-tech weapons and gear.
• Enhanced Combat Moves: Fire from behind cover or use enemies as human shields.
• Battle Online with Up to 8 Players: Across 8 maps, including submerged, plus enhanced community features.

Syphon Filter is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc. Syphon Filter: Logan's Shadow © 2008 Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and this item’s use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account. Internet connection and Memory Stick Duo™ may be required. Player responsible for Wi-Fi fees.
attributes.name: Syphon Filter®: Logan's Shadow
